snippet: James P. Allison, who saw the devastating effects of cancer on his family, discovered a way to disable one of its main defenses.
abstract: Interview with Dr James P Allison, chairman of immunology department at University of Texas MD Anderson Cancer Center in Houston and pioneer in cancer treatment field known as immunotherapy, in which body's immune system is used to fight cancer.
